progetto.network

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • progetto.network.AbstractRoom
      • progetto.network.Room
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public final class Room
extends AbstractRoom
    The extension of Abstract room that is able to keep the sync object synchronized.
